description: This view returns all received document records that can be used for EHI requests.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient for this received document.

columns.name: RECORD_STATE_5_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record state category ID for this received document.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Invalid

columns.name: INVLD_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the reason why this Received Documents record was invalidated.
